New email from "coderabbitai[bot]" <notifications@github.com>
Subject: Re: [777genius/claude-notifications-go] feat: ClaudeNotifier Swift rewrite + tmux integration + install.sh update fix (PR #32)

@coderabbitai[bot] commented on this pull request.



> +CODESIGN_FLAGS="--force --timestamp"
+
+if [ "$CI_MODE" = true ]; then
+    # CI: use Developer ID Application for distribution
+    SIGNING_IDENTITY="Developer ID Application"
+    CODESIGN_FLAGS="${CODESIGN_FLAGS} --options runtime"
+    if [ -f "$ENTITLEMENTS" ]; then
+        CODESIGN_FLAGS="${CODESIGN_FLAGS} --entitlements ${ENTITLEMENTS}"
+    fi
+    echo "Code signing with: ${SIGNING_IDENTITY} (hardened runtime)"
+    codesign ${CODESIGN_FLAGS} --sign "${SIGNING_IDENTITY}" "${APP_BUNDLE}"

`@777genius` Perfect! Thank you for implementing the preferred solution with the bash array â€” that's the cleanest way to handle paths with spaces in `codesign` arguments. The fix ensures that the entitlements path is preserved as a single element and won't be subject to word splitting. ðŸŽ¯
